name: ts-for-gir
description: Typescript .d.ts generator from GIR for gjs and node-gtk

scripts.update:submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach git pull origin master
scripts.update: yarn run update:submodules && yarn run update:packages
scripts.publish: yarn run build && yarn workspace @ts-for-gir/cli npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag latest --access public
scripts.test: yarn run build:all && yarn run regress && yarn run test:ava && yarn run test:girs:all && yarn run validate:app && yarn run build:all && yarn ts-for-gir:cli-examples:all
scripts.test:ava: yarn run build:cli && yarn run build:test:ava && ava tmp/test/ava/test.js
scripts.test:girs:all: yarn run build:types:all && yarn run validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gjs: yarn run build:types:gjs && yarn run validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node: yarn run build:types:node && yarn run validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:vda1: yarn run build:types:vda1 && yarn run validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gtk2: yarn run build:types:gtk2 && yarn run validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gtk3: yarn run build:types:gtk3 && yarn run validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gtk4: yarn run build:types:gtk4 && yarn run validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:vte4: yarn run build:types:vte4 && yarn run validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:modemmanager1: yarn run build:types:modemmanager1 && yarn run validate:types:modemmanager1
scripts.test:girs:timezonemap1: yarn run build:types:timezonemap1 && yarn run validate:types:timezonemap1
scripts.test:girs:rygelcore2: yarn run build:types:rygelcore2 && yarn run validate:types:rygelcore2
scripts.build:all: yarn run build && yarn workspaces foreach --parallel run build
scripts.start:cli-examples:all: yarn run start:cli-examples:gjs && yarn run start:cli-examples:node
scripts.build:types:node: yarn run clear:types:node && yarn run build:types:all --environments=node
scripts.validate:types:all: yarn run validate:types:gjs && yarn run validate:types:node
scripts.clear: yarn run clear:build && yarn run clear:types

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
